page.title: 16DORNEY COURT
page.content:
The land surrounding{Dorney Court}is partly owned by Eton College, Thames Water and{Mr. Palmer}himself. The land owned by Mr. Palmer is pasture land, orchard, water,woodland and land for growing soft fruits. The house dates back to 1460 and has been in the Palmer family since 1620
Mr. Palmer owns sheep which are commercially successful. The females are able to have 5 to 6 lambs a year.
Dorney Court is often used for filming. There are approximately 8000 visitors a year.
Mr. Palmer has been{Lord of the Manor since 1979. He owns 130 acres of land plus the Common, though he only owns the Earth not the pasture.
